title: Michigan Football Has a Top-10 Problem
text:
On Saturday night, the Michigan Wolverines will seek to do something they haven’t done very often during Jim Harbaugh’s five seasons as football coach: beat a top-10 opponent.

The Wolverines have compiled a 41-15 record during Harbaugh’s tenure, including a 29-10 mark in the Big Ten. But victories have rarely come against the nation’s best teams. In the 10 games Michigan has played against teams ranked in the top 10 of the Associated Press poll since the 2015 season, the Wolverines have won just once—against No. 8 Wisconsin...
description: On Saturday night, the Michigan Wolverines will seek to do something they haven’t done very often during Jim Harbaugh’s five seasons as football coach: beat a top-10 opponent.
